Package net.proteusframework.ui.background

This package provides API for performing background work in separate threads.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BackgroundTask<V>
    Background task.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BackgroundService
    Service for managing background tasks.
    BackgroundTaskProgressEvent
    Contains progress information for a background task.

Package net.proteusframework.ui.background Description

This package provides API for performing background work in separate threads. The workers can communicate progress to the background service. Progress information is relayed to listeners that can display the information to a user. This communication relay is handled automatically by having the user's web browser periodically check to see if progress has been made on any work submitted to the background service.

Example:


    _searchUI.getBackgroundService().submit(TASK_PROCESSING_NOTIFICATIONS(), emitter -> {
        _mailConfig.mailProviderList().forEach(MailProvider::processNotifications);
        return null;
    });
